spec_data.Name: perl-DBICx-Sugar
spec_data.Description:
Just some syntax sugar for your DBIx::Class applications. This was
originally created to remove code duplication between Dancer::Plugin::DBIC
and Dancer2::Plugin::DBIC.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:06:15 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Just some syntax sugar for DBIx::Class
